info.title: Code examples for &LYRA; using &AWS; SDKs

abstract.para: Code examples that show how to use &LYRA; with an &AWS; SDK.

chapter.para: The following code examples show how to use &LYRA; with an &AWS; software development kit (SDK).

variablelist.para: The examples are divided into the following categories:

listitem.para: Code excerpts that show you how to call individual service functions.
Code examples that show you how to accomplish a specific task by calling multiple functions within the same service.

chapter.para: For a complete list of &AWS; SDK developer guides and code examples, see . This topic also includes information about getting started and details about previous SDK versions.

info.title: Actions for &LYRA; using &AWS; SDKs

abstract.para: The following code examples show how to use &LYRA; with &AWS; SDKs.

section.para: The following code examples demonstrate how to perform individual &LYRA; actions with &AWS; SDKs. These excerpts call the &LYRA; API and are not intended to be run in isolation. Each example includes a link to GitHub, where you can find instructions on how to set up and run the code in context.
The following examples include only the most commonly used actions. For a complete list, see the &LYRA; API Reference.
Examples

info.title: Scenarios for &LYRA; using &AWS; SDKs

abstract.para: The following code examples show how to use &LYRA; with &AWS; SDKs.

section.para: The following code examples show you how to implement common scenarios in &LYRA; with &AWS; SDKs. These scenarios show you how to accomplish specific tasks by calling multiple functions within &LYRA;. Each scenario includes a link to GitHub, where you can find instructions on how to set up and run the code.
